tool_description: Generates personalized notification templates for account suspension and reactivation communications.

template_type.description: Type of communication: suspension_notice, appeal_instructions, reactivation_notice, warning

violation_summary.description: Brief description of violations for inclusion in notice

suspension_duration.description: Suspension duration in days for temporary suspensions

include_appeal_info.description: Whether to include appeal process information

error_messages: Invalid template type: Use one of [suspension_notice, appeal_instructions, reactivation_notice, warning].
Account data unavailable: Cannot personalize template due to missing account information.
Unsupported language: Language code not supported. Use standard ISO language codes.
Template generation failed: Unable to generate template with provided parameters.
usage: Specify template_type and account_id; provide violation_summary and suspension_duration for suspension notices; set language and include_appeal_info as needed.

delivery_channels.description: Recommended delivery channels for this communication

urgency_level.description: Message urgency: low, medium, high, critical
